entry.title: DoorDash Service Disruption
entry.content:
Mar 13, 12:43 EDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 13, 12:19 EDT
Monitoring - Service with DoorDash has returned to normal and we are actively monitoring at this time.

Mar 13, 11:46 EDT
Investigating - We are experiencing a service disruption with DoorDash that would cause problems with Rails orders. We will provide updates as they become available.

entry.title: Payment Processor Issues: Valutec
entry.content:
Mar 9, 19:06 EST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 9, 18:55 EST
Monitoring - We are seeing Valutec, Worldpay MercPay Webservices, and Worldpay EXPRESS transactions return to normal and continue to monitor the situation.

Mar 9, 18:23 EST
Identified - Worldpay has identified an issue on their end. The gift card processors affected include: Valutec, Worldpay MercPay Webservices, and Worldpay EXPRESS.

Mar 9, 17:44 EST
Investigating - We're detecting elevated errors processing payments through Valutec. Ordering may be affected at locations using Valutec as their payment provider.

entry.title: Partner Scheduled Maintenance: Paytronix
entry.content:
Mar 7, 06:00 EST
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Mar 7, 04:00 EST
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Mar 6, 16:50 EST
Scheduled - Paytronix has scheduled maintenance for 3/7 from 4am to 6am ET. During that time, payments and loyalty may be impacted.

https://status.pxsweb.com/incidents/s70sqdv5yvgj

entry.title: Issues with Loyalty-based Orders
entry.content:
Mar 2, 14:24 EST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 2, 13:54 EST
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Mar 2, 13:35 EST
Investigating - We are investigation a disruption in loyalty processing. Users may be unable to log in or use points or rewards with placed orders. We will provide updates as they become available.
